arabic.title: أنا أهو
text: و تشتكي من ده ز دهو

english.title: I'm Here
text: I am here and you are here
And the time is between us
Ill make stay up late for many nights
Ill make you melt , my dear
And complain about that and this
Ill make your eyes shed tears
As you made my eyes shed tears
I will not think of you
My life has gone with you
My heart melted in your love
My youth is lost with you
you didn't have mercy on my tears
And you  put out my candles with your hands
But I was nothing for you

arabic.title: توبة
text: انا كل ما اقول عن الحب حتوب

english.title: Unknown title
text: every time i say i'll repent of his love ..i return back to her
n when i hear her voice i feel longing n melting...n hear her
za3alni kteer m3 eni bakhaf...3ala za3lo ...she disappointment me alot although i fear ...for any thing upset her
what can i do ppl her beauty is her intercession
ok look n see the beauty ..look n see the naughty
i think he mean here she is quite n has this nice look in her eyes
it's something like that i don't know what he mean but sahi is the one who is quite n calm but thinking bout around
look so u will excuse me (for my love)
i adore her why she abandonment me
one time she make me happy other time she hurt me
i repent to say repentance..3000 repentance
longing tired me overcome me n left me in whirlpool
n i saw alot (suffering) from her n many cruel times
n i say as she left me i'll repent...repentance
but a word from her return me back...repentance
look n see the beauty ..look n see the naughty
i gave her my heart,my soul,my life n my feelings
i found him forgetton n crul on me n don't care bout me
cause his love is my weakness..repentance
she is playing with my feelings..repentance

arabic.title: ميغركش | Mayghorraksh
text: إن كنت فاكر أكمنك إحلويت شوية
دة انت اللي متربي في هوانا

english.title: Don't be Full of Yourself
text: don't be full of yourself, sweetie, because of your beauty
And the roses on your cheek
And if you come to talk to me1
don't say more than you can handle
I am the one who taught you
I am the one who made you understand how it goes
I am the one who, every night
goes to sleep and leaves you staying up the night
If you thought that because you got a bit prettier
And tricked a heart or two
then you can make a hobby out of it,
Then come to me and I'll remind you
Of who was the one who kept you confused
I am the one who taught you
I am the one who made you understand how it goes
I am the one who, every night
goes to sleep and leaves you staying up the night
Act as if you are bigger2 than anyone you want
But don't do that with me
You were raised on my love
Stay away so I wouldn't have to grow harsh and hurt you
Go find someone else to bring you comfort
And get lost in your night
